channel.description:
[center][i] They went with songs to the battle, they were young. Straight of limb, true of eyes, steady and aglow. They were staunch to the end against odds uncounted, They fell with their faces to the foe. They shall grow not old, as we that are left grow old: Age shall not weary them, nor the years condemn. At the going down of the sun and in the morning, We will remember them.[/i][/center]
[center][size=14pt][i][u]Lest We Forget[/u][/i][/size][/center]

item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

25 april is an important date in australia? finally something important on my birthdate. :} ^ and wow at the nuclear test dates.

item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

25/4/1954 - U.S. performs atmospheric nuclear test at Bikini Island atmosphere
25/4/1962 - U.S. resumes above ground nuclear testing, at Christmas Island
25/4/1971 - U.S.S.R. performs nuclear test at Semipalitinsk, Eastern Kazakhstan U.S.S.R.
25/4/1975 - U.S.S.R. performs underground nuclear test
25/4/1977 - U.S.S.R. performs nuclear test at Semipalitinsk, Eastern Kazakhstan U.S.S.R.
25/4/1980 - U.S.S.R. performs nuclear test at Semipalitinsk, Eastern Kazakhstan U.S.S.R.
25/4/1982 - U.S.S.R. performs nuclear test at Semipalitinsk, Eastern Kazakhstan U.S.S.R.
25/4/1982 - Great Britain performs nuclear test at Nevada Test Site
25/4/1983 - France performs nuclear test at Muruora Island
25/4/1984 - U.S.S.R. performs nuclear test at Semipalitinsk, Eastern Kazakhstan U.S.S.R.

Wow…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

25/4/1944 – The United Negro College Fund is incorporated.

Lest we forget.

item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

ANZAC Day, for those here who aren’t from either Australia or New Zealand. One of Australia’s most important national days.

item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[center] They went with songs to the battle, they were young.
Straight of limb, true of eyes, steady and aglow.
They were staunch to the end against odds uncounted,
They fell with their faces to the foe.
They shall grow not old, as we that are left grow old:
Age shall not weary them, nor the years condemn.
At the going down of the sun and in the morning,
We will remember them.[/center]

[center][size=14pt]Lest We Forget[/size][/center]
